short.ar: يقوم بدمج MyAnimeList/AniList/Kitsu/Simkl/Shikimori الى مواقع متنوعة، مع تتبع تلقائي للحلقات.
short.am,bg,bn,ca,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,e: Integrates MyAnimeList/AniList/Kitsu/Simkl/Shikimori into various sites, with auto episode tracking.
short.cs: Integruje MyAnimeList/AniList/Kitsu/Simkl do různých stránek s automatickým aktualizováním sledování.
short.de: Integriert MyAnimeList/AniList/Kitsu/Simkl/Shikimori auf diversen Seiten mit automatischer Episodenverfolgung.
short.es: Integra MyAnimeList/AniList/Kitsu/Simkl/Shikimori entre varios sitios,con auto seguidor de episodios.
short.fr: Intègre MyAnimeList/AniList/Kitsu/Simkl/Shikimori à de nombreux sites, avec un suivi automatique des épisodes.
short.id: Mengintegrasi MyAnimeList/AniList/Kitsu/Simkl/Shikimori ke beragam situs dengan pelacak episode otomatis.
short.it: Integra MyAnimeList/AniList/Kitsu/Simkl/Shikimori su svariati siti tenendo traccia in automatico degli episodi che guardi.
short.ms: Mengintegrasikan MyAnimeList/AniList/Kitsu/Simkl/Shikimori ke pelbagai laman dengan pelacak episod automatik.
short.nl: Integreert MyAnimeList/AniList/Kitsu/Simkl naar verschillende sites, met automatische afleveringen tracker.
short.pl: Integruje MyAnimeList/AniList/Kitsu/Simkl/Shikimori z różnymi stronami, z automatycznym śledzeniem epizodów.
short.pt_BR: Integra MyAnimeList/AniList/Kitsu/Simkl/Shikimori com vários sites, com rastreamento automático de episódios.
short.ru: Добавляет MyAnimeList/AniList/Kitsu/Simkl/Shikimori на различные сайты, с авто обновлением просмотренных серий.
short.sv: Integrerar MyAnimeList/AniList/Kitsu/Simkl till olika platser, med automatisk episodspårning.
short.th: ผสาน MyAnimeList/AniList/Kitsu/Simkl เข้าสู่เว็บไซต์ต่างๆ ด้วยการติดตามตอนอัตโนมัติ.
short.tr: MAL/AniList/Kitsu/Simkl/Shikimori'yi otomatik bölüm takibi ile çeşitli sitelere entegre eder.
short.zh_CN: 将MyAnimeList/AniList/Kitsu/Simkl集成一体并具备剧集自动跟踪功能。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
MAL-Sync — is a powerful extension for anime/manga fans who love tracking their progress and have a convenient access to their library ✨

This extension syncs with your favorite anime databases: MyAnimeList, AniList, Kitsu, Simkl — and integrates them into your favorite streaming sites with auto episode tracking.

MAL-Sync supports 100+ anime and manga pages like Crunchyroll, Netflix, MangaDex, 9anime — it even has support for Plex and apps alike! 🔥

A full list can be found in our GitHub page:
https://github.com/MALSync/MALSync#mal-sync

So, what are the core features of MAL-Sync?
👀 Anime and manga tracking
📂 Beautiful library — one click away!
📑 Anime/manga overview with all the necessary information
🔠 Translated into different languages
🎨 Design customization
🔁 List Sync — transfer the progress between different databases, e.g., MAL to AniList, and vice versa
🎥 Video player improvements
📺 Full size version (PWA)

And much-much more!

Join our community on Discord:
https://discord.com/invite/cTH4yaw
long.de,es,it,nl,pt_BR,sv,tr:
Works with Anilist/Kitsu too. Just change the sync mode in the settings.

Makes it possible to use your MyAnimeList anime/mangalist as a centralized bookmarks system for all supported pages.

► Anime:
  ● crunchyroll.com
  ● netflix.com
  ● kissanime.ru
  ● 9anime.to
  ● otakustream.tv
  ● gogoanimes.co
  ● twist.moe
  ● anime4you.one
  ● animeflv.net
  ● jkanime.net
  ● branitube.org
  ● turkanime.tv

► Manga:
  ● kissmanga.com
  ● mangadex.org
  ● mangarock.com

What else can it do?

MyAnimeList
  - Direct links to the supported websites
  - Links to the next episode
  - Enlarge thumbnails in many places
  - Adds missing watching status tags like in the related anime section
  - Estimated time to next episode and estimated current episode number 
    (JP release time)

miniMAL (Extension Popup)
  - Allows to browse, search and edit MyAnimeList anime/manga 
    everywhere
  - Access MAL Bookmarks everywhere
  - MAL-Sync's Settings

Update Check [BETA]
  * This feature is disabled by default. You will need to enable 
     it in the miniMAL popup
  - Checks for new episodes/chapters in the background and sends 
    out a notification
  - Updates the links to the next episode
  - Makes current episode estimation more accurate


Github: https://github.com/lolamtisch/MALSync
Discord: https://discordapp.com/invite/cTH4yaw
